title: Bug 23935 - Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both the Text widget and the Tree widget are children of the shell. The issue is observed on Windows only. A potential workaround could be to create the text editor as a sibling of the tree widget and move it above the tree widget.
OB: When running the attached code in build 20020920, the Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus.
EB: When running the attached code in build 20020920, the Text widget with Tree parent should lose focus on Windows as it does on Linux.
SR:
1. Run the attached code in build 20020920. 
2. Observe that the left tree and text behave as expected on Windows and Linux.
